REGISTER.TITLE: Register
REGISTER.TESTIMONIAL_HEADER: All it takes is one step to move forward
REGISTER.TESTIMONIAL_CONTENT: You're one step away from engaging your customers, retaining them and finding new ones.
REGISTER.TERMS_ACCEPT: By creating an account, you agree to our T & C and Privacy policy

COMPANY_NAME.LABEL: Company name
COMPANY_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your company name. eg: Wayne Enterprises

FULL_NAME.LABEL: Full name
FULL_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your full name. eg: Bruce Wayne

EMAIL.LABEL: Work email
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your email address. E.g., bruce{'@'}example{'.'}com
EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid email address

PASSWORD.LABEL: Գաղտնաբառ
PASSWORD.IS_INVALID_PASSWORD: Գաղտնաբառը պետք է պարունակի առնվազն 1 մեծատառ, 1 փոքրատառ, 1 թիվ և 1 հատուկ նշան

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Woot Server, Please try again later
